document.text:
From: ' 
To:' 
Cc: ' 
Subject: RE: Epstein Case 
Date: Fri, 06 Sep 2019 18:12:55 +0000 
Understood, thanks. 
From: 
Sent: Friday, September 6, 2019 12:58 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: Epstein Case 
Thanks for letting me know. Monday should be ok, but I'm reluctant to let this spill over much later, since we do have the 
pending request. I'm sure you understand. 
Office of Chief Medical Examiner 
New York, NY 10016 
The information contained in this e-mail communication may be confidential andkir legally privileged and is for the use of the intended 
recipient only. If you are not the intended recipient, or an authorized employee or an agent responsible for delivering it to the intended 
recipient, the dissemination, distribution or reproduction of this communication or its contents (including any attachments) is prohibited. 
If you have received this communication in error, please notify us immediately by telephone or reply e-mail and permanently delete it and 
any copies from your system files. 
From: 
Sent: Friday, September 06, 2019 12:56 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: Re: Epstein Case 
Hi the review is taking a little longer here, so we will get you our redactions on Monday. Please let us know if 
this poses any issues. Thank you. 
On Sep 3, 2019, at 4:29 PM, 
> 
wrote: 
Great, I'll give you a call at 2:45 tomorrow. Thanks. 
From: 
Sent: Tuesday, September 3, 2019 4:24 PM 
To: 
Subject: RE: Epstein Case 
Tomorrow between 2-3 or after about 4:30, or Thursday after 2:30; either is fine with me. 
Thanks! 
EFTA00032423

Office 
of Chief Medical Examiner 
New 
York, NY 10016 
The information contained in this e-mail communication may be confidential 
and/or

From: 
Sent: Tuesday, September 03, 2019 4:21 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: Epstein Case 
We will work on providing that list. Yes, I'm available tomorrow after 2 or Thursday after 2- what works for you? 
Thanks. 
From: 
Sent: Tuesday, September 3, 2019 2:26 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: RE: Epstein Case 
I have now had the opportunity to discuss this request with both and our and I 
am renewing my request that you provide a list of the specific documents and other materials that you are requesting 
the OCME not disclose. Additionally, I would appreciate the opportunity to speak with you briefly concerning the 
document that you have requested that OCME destroy, and that OCME has deactivated in the manner that I described 
to you last week. Please let me know when would be convenient for you; thanks. 
Office of 
Chief Medical Examiner 
New 
York, NY 10016 
The information contained in this e-mail communication may be confidential and/or legally privileged and is for the use of the intended 
recipient only. If you are not the intended recipient, or an authorized employee or an agent responsible for delivering it to the intended 
recipient, the dissemination, distribution or reproduction of this communication or its contents (including any attachments) is 
prohibited. If you have received this communication in error, please notify us immediately by telephone or reply e-mail and 
permanently delete it and any copies from your system files. 
From: 
Sent: Wednesday, August 28, 2019 10:28 AM 
To: 
Cc: 
Subject: Epstein Case 
EFTA00032424

Per our discussion, please see attached. 
We are also requesting that OCME destroy its copy of the draft interview report, dated August 12, 2019, relating to the 
FBI's interview of 
Please let us know if you have any questions. Thank you. 
Assistant United States Attorney 
Southern District of New York 
EFTA00032425
